title: Ticket #6639: Design job submission interface via shared filesystem
description: We are interested in creating a job submission interface where all communication is done via a (shared) filesystem. The filesystem could be NFS, DropBox, or FTP. The motivation is to allow remote job submission to the TITAN supercomputer at Oak Ridge National Lab. Network communication with outside machines is strictly limited there, but file transfers are allowed.
